rules.fullName: Denied More Information Required Email Notification to BIA Advisor for BIA Grants

criteriaItems.value: BIA Commercial - Industrial Facade and Property Improvement,BIA Innovation Fund,BIA Leadership Fund,BIA Outside Mural and Street Art,BIA Streetscape Master Plan Funding

rules.description: This rule will trigger and email alert to BIA Advisor who submitted the application Grant application for approval and Rejected by Manager with more Information required.

rules.fullName: ES BIC Grant Program Outcome Report %231
rules.description: Sends Email and reminder notification to applicants in order to get them to report on their program activities for Report 1.

rules.fullName: ES BIC Grant Program Outcome Report %231 Manually Trigger

criteriaItems.value: Business Incubation Grant,Business Incubation Grant Read Only

rules.description: Sends Email to applicants in order to get them to report on their program activities for Report 1 at any random time when User wants when Status is completed

rules.fullName: ES Business Incubation Grant Read Only Record Type Update
rules.description: This workflow will update the record type to read only once status has been completed, withdrawn or Declined that is it has reached its end state.

rules.fullName: ES Event Grant Program Outcome Survey Manually Trigger

rules.fullName: Email Notification to Investment Activity Owner for IMIT Application Submission for Approval

rules.fullName: Email Notification to Queue for BIA Grant Request from Client
rules.description: This rule will trigger and email alert to appropriate BIA Queue when client submit BIA Grant Application online

rules.fullName: Email Notification to Queue for ES Event%2FBIC Grant Request from Client
rules.description: This workflow rule will trigger an email to ES Event/BIC Grant Review Queue whenever any new Grant application will be submitted by Client through online form

rules.fullName: Email Notification to Queue for IMIT Request from Client
rules.description: This workflow rule will send an email alert to notify the IMIT once any new IMIT request has been submitted through online form.

rules.fullName: Update BIA%2FSector%2FBIC%2FEvent Grant Application Status Completed after Payment
rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (5 AND 6) OR (7 AND 8 AND 9 AND 2 AND 3) OR (10 AND 11)

rules.description: This workflow rule will update the status to completed once an application has been Approved and payment has been made for ES/BIA/Sector grants
